name: nhl-score-api
description: A JSON API that returns the scores and goals from the latest finished NHL games.

name: nhl-recap
description: A web app for checking the latest NHL scores from nhl-score-api.

name: Anglicisms
description: Ruby scripts I created for investigating the text corpus in my bachelor's thesis where I analyzed anglicisms in French articles. http://peruukki.github.com/Anglicisms
